note.p: Zoologist. Doctor of medicine, 1861; of natural science, 1874. Taught at the Faculty of Medicine, Montpellier; Faculty of Sciences, Dijon, 1875–7; Faculty of Sciences, Lyon, where he became dean in 1884.
Le comité des travaux historiques et scientifiques, L’Annuaire de la France savante XVIIe–XXe, www.cths.fr/an/prosopo.php?id=983 (accessed 28 March 2013).
